net.viktorc.detroid.framework.validation

Interface ControllerEngine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    UCIEngine
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Detroid

    public interface ControllerEngine
extends UCIEngine
    An interface for an engine that provides the basic functionalities required for a user interface base engine.
    Author:
    Viktor

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface net.viktorc.detroid.framework.uci.UCIEngine

        Returns whether it's white's turn.
        Returns:

      • getMoveHistory

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMoveHistory()
        Returns a list of all past moves made on the board in Pure Algebraic Coordinate Notation in chronological order.
        Returns:
        A list of all past moves made on the board in PACN. It should never return null.

      • getLegalMoves

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLegalMoves()
        Returns a list of all legal moves in the current position in Pure Algebraic Coordinate Notation.
        Returns:
        A list of all legal moves in the current position in PACN. It should never return null.

      • setGame

        boolean setGame(java.lang.String pgn)
        Parses the Portable Game Notation string and sets its internal data structure tracking the state of the game accordingly. It returns whether the game could be successfully set or not.
        Parameters:
        pgn - A PGN string representation of a chess game.
        Returns:
        Whether the game could be successfully set or not.

      • setPlayers

        void setPlayers(java.lang.String whitePlayer,
                java.lang.String blackPlayer)
        Sets the names of the players.
        Parameters:
        whitePlayer - The name of the white player.
        blackPlayer - The name of the black player.

        Parameters:

      • drawByAgreement

        void drawByAgreement()
        Sets the game state to draw by agreement from both parties.

      • whiteForfeit

        void whiteForfeit()
        Sets the game state to unspecified black victory. This can be due to a loss on time, resignation, or breaking of the rules.

      • blackForfeit

        void blackForfeit()
        Sets the game state to unspecified white victory. This can be due to a loss on time, resignation, or breaking of the rules.

      • convertPACNToSAN

        java.lang.String convertPACNToSAN(java.lang.String move)
        Converts a move legal in the current position from Pure Algebraic Coordinate Notation to Standard Algebraic Notation.
        Parameters:
        move - The move in PACN.
        Returns:
        The move in SAN.

        Converts a move legal in the current position from Standard Algebraic Notation to Pure Algebraic Coordinate Notation.
        Parameters:
        move - The move in SAN.
        Returns:
        The move in PACN.

        Returns a Portable Game Notation string representing the state of the game.

      • unplayLastMove

        default java.lang.String unplayLastMove()
        Takes back the last move and returns it in Pure Algebraic Coordinate Notation. It returns null if no moves have been made yet.
        Returns:
        The last move made in Pure Algebraic Coordinate Notation

      • perft

        default long perft(int depth)
        Runs a perft to the specified depth in the current position and returns the number of leaf nodes counted while traversing the tree.
        Parameters:
        depth - The depth at which the leaf nodes are to be counted.
        Returns:
        The number of leaf nodes counted.

      • divide

        default java.util.Set<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long>> divide(int depth)
        Returns a set of entries with all legal moves in the current position as the key set and the perft results at depth - 1 for the positions the respective moves lead to as the value set. The moves should be in PACN.
        Parameters:
        depth - The perft depth. Perft to a depth of this minus one will be executed for each legal move from the current position.
        Returns:
        A set of entries with all legal moves in the current position as the key set and the perft results at depth - 1 for the positions the respective moves lead to as the value set.
